author: m.kalinin
content: note that theses test are for the logic introduced by https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3818

author: m.kalinin
content: so, it needs to be merged first, and then implemented by clients

author: tersec
content: yes, is it intended that there be an alpha.7? those are not part of alpha.6, and it's nicer to have test vectors ahead of time

author: m.kalinin
content: I think that we can make this one and https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3918 a part of the next release. cc <@539495253418180618>

author: __flcl
content: <@543900561460822016> @channel hello. What EIP or spec defines chain id as a uint256?

content: Just to clarify on https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8854, the `req` in `rlp(req)` is just the flat encoding, correct?
